thread.title: These Images Accurately Display 2 Very Different Kinds of People in the World
thread.title_full: These Images Accurately Display 2 Very Different Kinds of People in the World

author: Hilary White
title: These Images Accurately Display 2 Very Different Kinds of People in the World
text:
2 Kinds of People in the World Tumblr These Images Accurately Display 2 Very Different Kinds of People in the World February 23, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 These Images Accurately Display 2 Very Different Kinds of People in the World 
We all have our own little "isms" — the small things we do that define us, even when we don't realize we're doing them. From your choice of utensil to the organization of your phone apps, you're stating what kind of person you are to the rest of the world. You'd be surprised the extent to which you'll go to get your gas price amount down to the right cent makes you stand out from someone who doesn't even notice the price at all. We loved these images created by Tumblr user 2 Kinds of People , because we guarantee you will relate to one or the other almost immediately.
